notes: View a season overview
See the results for all F1 races from 2019 dating back to 2000
See the qualifying results for Q1, Q2 and Q3 for all races
As of May 2020 it is unclear what the 2020 season will look like, so I cannot guarantee that new races will be updated live
Changed app flow to default to the season overview screens rather than the 2019 season
Changed theme throughout so it can be more customisable down the road
Overhauled UI for viewing the history of F1
Flashback now supports all races from 1950 to 2019
See a breakdown of the constructor standings per race
Fixed some blank spaces in 2017 race data
Updated components to 2.0.1
Added championship standings options to all seasons
Added daily sync for current
Updated firebase dependencies
Shifted app design over to a Material Design 2 inspired UI
Improved network state management
The usual disclaimer of general data patching and bug fixes
Added dark mode toggle to settings
Added grid penalty indicator to race qualifying view
Added news feed to the app
Added ability to toggle preferred news sources
Added status for race data being synchronised
Moved news to its own screen
Fixed race status oversight in prep for 2020 season start
Changed loading stack to only show spinner and not skeleton views on initial load
Tidied up network logging
Fixed pit lane starts not being filtered properly in qualifying view
Updated swiperefesh to 1.1.0
Updated components to 2.1.0
Updated utilities to 2.0.1
Updated firebase analytics to 17.4.3
Updated firebase crashlytics to 2.10.1
Addressed some bugs that have risen due to season starting
Fixed issue with partial qualifying data not displaying when race data is unavailable
Added setting to expand season list to full height by default
Fixed some wording oversights with races being scheduled in the future or past
Fixed optional message being displayed
Moved app banner position to pinned position at the top of the display
Added track layout images to some of the modern tracks
Added qualifying and race data distinction with data availability
Added constructor colour bar to qualifying and race details to make drivers constructor more obvious
Fixed DNF label showing when driver finishes normally
Fixed message label appearing in top of screen properly
Updated layout for driver season status to be less confusing
Fixed theming bugs on maps links
Fixed incorrect round being used as reference message for driver stats
Backend fixes to data management
Added notification for when results are being pulled
Fix for Perez qualifying data showing up in Round 4 2020 data
Fix for closing driver season dropdown collapsing again
Moved constructor color bars to edge
Added RaceFans.net as a supported news site in the news tab
Bringing project dependencies up to date
Backend prep for driver career breakdown
Fixed some race data format errors from races in 1962
Improved in-app experience during a sync event after a race
Adds driver overview. See a history of any drivers performance in F1!
Fixed edge case crash in driver season data updating whilst app is open
Usual assortment of bugfixes and improvements
Fixes issue with 2020 Racing Point penalty not being shown in the preview
Fixed position delta always being 0 for podium sitters
Fixed DNF label showing up for not finished status
Fixes issue with driver stats qualifying data taking into account DNS
Adds ability to customise bar animations throughout the app
Fixes typos throughout error messages
Fixes issue with track layout displayed in 2020 Sakhir Grand Prix race
Migrates to Firebase crashlytics
Usual assortment of bugfixes and improvements
Adds setting option to open news articles in external browser by default
Fixes crash in certain seasons in the 1980s
Fixes theming issue with circuit icons that are not fully supported
Adds wikipedia links to driver overview, race and circuit information screens
Fixes some constructor penalties not being applied to disqualified teams throughout F1
Handles constructors championship starting in 1958 properly
Tweaked layout of Driver Overview season navigation
Constructor overview! View a simplistic history of a constructor in F1
Fixes more than 5 drivers under constructor not stacking properly
Migrated news away to RSS feed - Configure predefined or your own RSS feeds for formula 1 news
Fixed typos in settings panel
Fixed edge case crash in 1990s qualifying data
Increases minimum support to Android 6.0 Marshmellow (API 23)
Adds initial landscape support and a custom view for the home screen
Changes RSS news animation and close animation to reduce crash rates
Fixes crash when Show on map is pressed on certain devices
Fixes some theming issues for new RSS feed section of the app
Updated firebase analytics to 18.0.0
Updated firebase auth to 20.0.1
Updated firebase firestore to 22.0.0
Updated firebase crashlytics to 17.3.0
Added notification support! Get notified for races and qualifying sessions 30 minutes before
Fixed theming gaps in Android 6.0 and 6.1
Adds copy of privacy policy in app
Adds auto enrolment into notification support
Fixes driver overview where drivers swap teams mid season
Fixes typos in notification channels
Fixes some crashes in RSS configure screen
Tweaked layout for driver overview constructor tab to make progression clearer
Adds window for default season being shown to be previous year until calendar is confirmed
Usual assortment dependency updates, bug fixes and small typos
App preparations for 2021! Will default to 2020 until 2021 calendar is confirmed
Moves season switcher from navigation bar to toolbar in preparation for search
Adds circuit diagrams for Buddh and Fuji circuits
Adds option to fade drivers who retire from a Grand Prix in race overview
Bug fixes to address initial load issues with images
Adds a new dashboard homescreen with sliding panes for season list
Adds a new Up Next section to the season list so you can see how long it is until the next race
Adds ability to show qualifying delta by long clicking qualifying results
Fix for progress bar values sometimes being fractionally incorrect after animation
Other minor bug fixes and performance improvements
Adds swipe to dismiss gesture throughout the app
Adds ability to set a default season to load the app into
Adds 6 more track layouts to races and circuit screens
Adds ability to view website link for RSS sources
Fixes back behavior through the app
Other minor bug fixes and crash fixes
Adds an up next widget for your home screen!
Fixes over-animation throughout menu list when nothing seems to change
Minor optimisations for tablet layout sizing
Fixes some rare crashes with certain older seasons dates being misaligned
App will now handle errors much more gracefully and notify the flashback team of inconsistent data
Up next section now supports event start times!
Changed default season settings management
Bug fixes and backend updates
Added categories to the settings screens
Fixed bug in theme preference not being applied immediately

Updated android lifecycle to 2.3.0
Updated firebase crashlytics to 2.5.0

Made it clearer when data is currently unavailable in the app
Bug fixes and backend improvements, mainly around loading feedback

Fixed bug in season list showing glitched indicator when certain defaults are selected
Adds pull to refresh support for RSS feed
Fixed a bug with the calendar view where single digit days get squashed
Updated layout for the rest of the apps to adopt Android 12 style collapsible headers

Bug fixes in animation delay for dashboard navigation bar
Bug fixes in data management to fix points counting for pre 1980 seasons

notes.title: Sprint Qualifying
notes: Sprint qualifying support! Now supports grand prix sprint qualifying data
Layout tweaks throughout in order to make UI look more consistent
Adds next race titlebar header
Tweaked settings wording to make animation and theming preferences clearer
Adds day countdown for next race events
Fixes bug in negative penalties being shown for constructor due to sprint qualifying
Adds new horizontal animation for calendar view tracks!
Usual assortment of bug fixes

notes.title: Android 12 support
notes: Adds initial support for android 12
Adds android 12 splash screen support
Adds support for half points throughout season in light of 2021 Belgium Grand Prix result
More minor fixes in preparation for last half of 2021 season
Adds sprint qualifying fixes
Minor bugs for android 12 compatibility with widgets and notifications
Accessibility bug fixes throughout all screen
Minor bug fixes, general dependency updates and refactoring

notes.title: Local notifications
notes: Adds notification support for free practice
Improves experience of enroling in notifications
Adds more track layouts for older F1 races
Minor theming updates in Up next section
Minor bug fixes to new notification support
Content bug fixes throughout the app in older seasons
Improved error handling when data is missing

notes.title: Search
notes: Flashback now supports search! Search for any driver, constructor, circuit or race from the entire history of F1
Updates notification banners to be more descriptive
Minor updates to settings ordering and wording
Adds sound and priority to notifications
Minor behind the scenes refactoring
Simplifies wording for default season management
Fixes some padding issues for Widgets in Android 12
Fixes some crashes that happen on non-english devices
Usual assortment of bug fixes and preparations for new features

notes.title: Rewrite
notes: Rewrites process of caching and updating race data to be persistent and auto updating
Adds schedule preview to upcoming races in home screen
Adds more animations around content loading
Adds pull to refresh everywhere
Adds new notification banner
Adds autoscrolling to the current race when you open the app
Adds practice, qualifying and race times to the race views for supported races
Fixes issues with timezones not displaying correct race times in details view
Minor theming updates for Android 12 Material you
